name: Drone Management System
description: A web based system to manage a fleet of drones to strengthen health supply chain in remote parts of Nepal.

SDGs.evidenceText: The aim is to save lives with last mile delivery system in areas which are inaccessible via means of road transportation. The DMS (Drone Management System) helps to manage and monitor all the drones connected to the system.
A team of 16 young engineers are giving final touches to the two models of the home-made drone prototypes â€” an octocopter and a fixed-wing drone.

The aim is to save lives with last mile delivery system in areas which are inaccessible via means of road transportation. The DMS (Drone Management System) helps to manage and monitor all the drones connected to the system.
